New Records: David Willey reached 100 ODI wickets in his final international game
Key Match Events: Ben Stokes scored 84 runs, Joe Root scored 60 runs, David Willey took 3 wickets, Babar Azam scored 38 runs, Mohammad Rizwan scored 36 runs, Agha Salman scored 51 runs, Shaheen Shah Afridi scored 25 runs, Mohammad Wasim scored 16 runs, Haris Rauf scored 35 runs
Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and decided to bat, Pakistan required a win by an enormous margin to force a gargantuan swing on net run rate
Post-Match Reflections: England secured their place in the next Champions Trophy
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a turning wicket
Others: England's innings was at risk of petering out, but late hitting from several batters fired England well beyond 300
